title: Weekly Product Pulse: November 17-23, 2025
overview: This week's pulse highlights user frustration with persistent technical glitches, notably impacting app stability and data accuracy. Payment-related issues, including delayed refunds and withdrawal problems, remain a significant concern. Additionally, users are actively requesting enhanced trading features like Stop Loss/Target orders and improved charting tools to elevate their experience.

themes.name: Glitches & Bugs
themes.summary: Users are highly frustrated by persistent technical issues, impacting app stability and data accuracy across various functionalities.

themes.name: Payments
themes.summary: Significant dissatisfaction stems from unresolved payment issues, including delayed refunds, withdrawal problems, and perceived unhelpful customer support.

themes.name: Trading Features
themes.summary: There is a strong demand for advanced trading functionalities and improvements to existing order types and charting tools.

quotes: Glitches & Bugs: Doesn't exit when trying to exit, hangs.
Payments: Paisa kat liya customer help nahin karta hai Mera 3 mutual fund rejected ho gaya hai abhi tak refund nahin mila 3 Mahina ho chuka hai
Trading Features: Please add SL & TARGET set in chart for equity intraday trading in mobile app...
actions: Prioritize investigation and resolution of critical technical glitches, especially those affecting data consistency and application freezes.
Review and streamline the payment and refund process to ensure timely resolution of financial discrepancies and improve communication.
Evaluate and plan for enhancements to core trading features, including SL/Target orders and more detailed charting tools.
